explains: n. 髭，小胡子；长髭；（动物嘴部周围的）须状物

sentences.en: His moustache prickled when he kissed me.
sentences.cn: 他吻我的时候胡子扎人。

sentences.en: He has decided to grow a beard and a moustache.
sentences.cn: 他已经决定留起络腮胡子和髭。

sentences.en: The thick beard had gone, replaced by a bushy moustache.
sentences.cn: 浓密的络腮胡子不见了，换成了一撇密匝匝的小胡子。
